name: Slime Idle
description:
Game made for OpenGameArt's Summer Game Jam 2022 (30 day game jam)

- It's an idle game where you direct slimes to do jobs to collect resources and complete quests. 

NOTE:
- There is no save implemented
- There are 101 things to purchase and the game is technically done from there

Here are the 6 uses, also can be found by clicking the credits button in game:
